amendment.description: Amendment provides for regional workshops as part of the Cybersecurity Awareness and Education program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 111-410 to provide for regional workshops as part of the Cybersecurity Awareness and Education program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
